snippet.title: Hex of the Lich Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Hex of the Lich is a spellcrafting turn-based roguelike. Forge your spells out of hexes and find new ones along the way. Gain powerful artifacts that enhance your abilities. Advance through dungeons filled with bouncing robots, eldritch horrors, and otherworldly invaders. Can you face the Lich?

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1631900/Hex_of_the_Lich/
Discord: https://discord.gg/3nrfUTnJWv
Twitter: https://twitter.com/ClobsterGames
SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/clobster-games
Email: clobstergames@gmail.com
